description: The sleeveless version of their original, best-selling classic that continues to offer premium core warmth with a unique, ultra-soft feel, the Polartec® High Loft® Vest features lightweight Polartec® High Loft® fleece for added stretch and comfort.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec High Loft Vest - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® High Loft® Fleece - 97% Polyester, 3% Elastane
